title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 137.7 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 137.7 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The restrictions and limitations contained in this Part may
be waived pursuant to provisions of law by the Director of the Budget whenever
he determines that strict adherence to the rules would be detrimental to the
sound and orderly administration of State government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
137.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
